s: October 11, 2024 - TechCrunch Brand Studio · Crunchboard ... Amazon executives in charge of developing new technologies for checking out of physical stores – including Just Walk Out, Dash Carts, and Amazon One – are leaving or have left the division, TechCrunch has learned....

t: Autonomous Retail Technology - Just Walk Out Technology - AWS
s: 2 weeks ago - Elevate your small-format store with AI-powered, checkout-free technology. Just Walk Out enables faster transactions, labor optimization, and better customer experiences in compact retail spaces such as corporate campus grab-and-go markets and unattended airport walkthrough markets.

t: Walking the Amazon - Wikipedia
s: April 13, 2025 - Walking the Amazon was an expedition conceived and successfully completed by British explorer Ed Stafford. It was the first recorded time anyone had journeyed the entire length of the Amazon River from source to sea on foot and was recognised as an official Guinness World Record.

t: Amazon launches first Just Walk Out technology store at an Amazon office in Canada (Photos)
s: September 5, 2024 - Amazon’s YYZ14 office at 120 Bremner Boulevard in Toronto has launched the first Just Walk Out technology store at an Amazon office in Canada, with a second location planned for the YYZ18 office at 18 York Street later this year.  · The store at YYZ14 offers a variety of ‘grab and go’ ...

t: Amazon Fresh grocery store: Meet Just Walk Out shopping
s: June 15, 2021 - Now customers can save time shopping for groceries by skipping the checkout line with the launch of our new Amazon Fresh grocery store with Just Walk Out shopping, now open in The Marketplace at Factoria in Bellevue, Washington.

t: Amazon’s Just Walk Out tech rolls out to more stadiums, universities
s: September 3, 2024 - Commanders fans will have a new reason to cheer with seven new Just Walk Out locations opening within the stadium, which is the most stores launched at once for a sports stadium. Amazon’s Just Walk Out will also debut at Baltimore’s M&T Bank Stadium with its first Just Walk Out store slated ...

t: Amazon is removing Just Walk Out at its grocery stores and plans to sell the tech to businesses - Fast Company
s: April 23, 2024 - Just Walk Out uses cameras, AI, and sensor trackers to determine what's taken off of shelves, enabling customers to grab what they want and leave if they insert a credit card or another payment method at a store's entry gate.

t: Walking the Amazon: 861 Days by Ed Stafford | Goodreads
s: Ed and his fellow walker doggedly dodged drug traffickers (narcos) and battled depression during the 2 year plus trek through relatively unexplored South America. The story moves with pace and I found it a really inspiring effort to achieve a brand new journey.

t: Amazon bets on selling cashierless technology to retailers after pulling it from most U.S. stores
s: October 5, 2024 - Amazon is selling its cashierless technology called "Just Walk Out" to outside retailers. CNBC gets a behind-the-scenes look at how the technology works.

t: Amazon's Just Walk Out stores relied on '1,000 people in India watching,' not AI - Washington Times
s: May 6, 2024 - While Amazon's Just Walk Out technology at its Fresh grocery stores was touted as being powered by artificial intelligence, a new report says it actually relied heavily on manual monitoring by some 1,000 people in India.
